price: Then after that will come a year in which people will have abundant rain, and in which they will press [grapes and olives].”
arabic: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ
